summary: A man climbs a 12,000-foot mountain to search for his wife, who was lost on their honeymoon. Another couple makes the dangerous climb with him.
cast: Gustav Diessl|Leni Riefenstahl|Ernst Petersen|Ernst Udet|Otto Spring|Mizzi Götzel|Kurt Gerron|Charles McNamee
director: Directors: Arnold Fanck (as Dr. Arnold Fanck), Georg Wilhelm Pabst (as G.W. Pabst)
title: Prisioneros de la montaña
